trans-unit.source: Supports all fields in JScript.
trans-unit.target: 在 JScript 中，支援所有的欄位。

trans-unit.source: This is the base class for all fields that are defined by JScript.
trans-unit.target: 這是所有的欄位所定義的 JScript 的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the name binding category.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別屬於名稱繫結類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes that are associated with this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個欄位相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes></xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that declares this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告此欄位的型別。

trans-unit.source: null in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位的內部中繼資料表示法的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the internal metadata representation of this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this field.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含附加至這個欄位的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this field, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含已附加至這個欄位，只會搜尋指定型別的屬性的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this field.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的屬性類型是否附加至這個欄位。

trans-unit.source: The attribute type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of member that this field is.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位是的成員類型。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of class derived from <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> that this class derives from.
trans-unit.target: 識別的類別衍生自類型<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>這個類別衍生自。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>, because this class derives from <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>因為這個類別衍生自<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來取得這個執行個體，透過反映的類別物件。

trans-unit.source: The type that declares this method.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個方法的型別。
